presets.name: H.265 Fast NVENC

presets.name: AV1 NVENC HQ ConstQP18
presets.description: RTX40+/Ada 视觉无损：AV1 NVENC constqp18 p7 HQ，10-bit，B-ref each，rc-lookahead 32，AQ 开，音频 AAC 320k EBU。

descriptionI18n.en: RTX 40+/Ada near-lossless: AV1 NVENC constqp18 p7 HQ, 10-bit, B-ref each, rc-lookahead 32, AQ on; audio AAC 320k with EBU loudness.

presets.name: AV1 NVENC HQ ConstQP18 (Copy Audio)

descriptionI18n.zh-CN: RTX40+/Ada 视觉无损（音频复制版）：AV1 NVENC constqp18 p7 HQ，10-bit，B-ref each，rc-lookahead 32，AQ 开，音频流原样复制。
descriptionI18n.en: RTX 40+/Ada near-lossless (audio copy): AV1 NVENC constqp18 p7 HQ, 10-bit, B-ref each, rc-lookahead 32, AQ on; audio stream copied without re-encode.

presets.name: H.265 NVENC HQ ConstQP19
